author: alon.ssv.network
content:
Hi everyone, just discovered this group and wanted to share our research into staking pools. 
From a high level it's a protocol that enables participants to join open pools by:
1) secret share validator keys
2) coordinate pools to sign duties
3) new pool formation 
4) rotation of participants between pools to prevent takeover (especially when forming new pools) 

The research repo also includes a preliminary POC for signing and participant rotation.

https://ethresear.ch/t/trustless-staking-pools-with-a-consensus-layer-and-slashed-pool-participant-replacement/7198

https://github.com/bloxapp/eth2-staking-pools-research
